intro: Adrift, alone, and alive—survive the flood and uncover the truth.
description:
Shipwrecked Raft Survival throws you into the heart of a world swallowed by water. After a catastrophic flood drowns the Earth, you're one of the few survivors... or are you the only one left? Stranded on a makeshift raft, with nothing but a hook and your instincts, you must scavenge floating debris, fish for food, purify water, and craft essential tools to stay alive.

Build and expand your raft, cook meals to stave off hunger, and turn scraps into survival gear. But survival is only the beginning. What caused the flood? Are you truly alone? Piece together the mystery as you battle the elements in this unforgiving oceanic world.

Every wave carries both danger and hope—will you ride it to salvation?
